note.p: Research Field: Physics, thermodynamics, optics, electricity
Education: Stettin; University of Berlin (1840-1844); Halle

Career: Professor of Physics, Royal Artillery Engineering School, Berlin (1850); Professor, Zurich (1855); Professor, Wurzburg (1857); Professor of Natural Philosophy, Bonn (1869-1888); served in the Ambulance Corps during the Franco-German war
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1890 vol 48 pp i-viii signed by G F F G
References: J G O'Hara, 'George Johnstone Stoney, FRS, and the Concept of the Electron' in NR 1974-5 vol 29 pp 265-276
